author: Special Correspondent
text:
An entrepreneurship motivation seminar for the benefit of the ex-servicemen, and their family members will be held at the Collectorate hall here on January 4.

Officials from different departments and experts will explain the various opportunities available for setting up self-employment ventures and the steps to be taken for identifying the suitable opportunities.

They will also guide the ex-servicemen on the procedures and rules to be adopted for setting up small industries, preparation of project report.

The bank officials and personnel from the government departments extending financial assistance for such ventures will explain the loan and subsidy provided by them.

Ex-servicemen who are successfully running self employment ventures will also narrate their success stories on the occasion.
title: Seminar for ex-servicemen
